value.verse: I love you, O LORD my strength, *
value.halfverse: O LORD my stronghold, my crag, and my haven.

value.verse: My God, my rock in whom I put my trust, *
value.halfverse:
my shield, the horn of my salvation, and my refuge;
 you are worthy of praise.

value.verse: I will call upon the LORD, *
value.halfverse: and so shall I be saved from my enemies.
and the torrents of oblivion made me afraid.
value.verse: The breakers of death rolled over me, *

value.halfverse: and the snares of death were set for me.
value.verse: The cords of hell entangled me, *

value.halfverse: and cried out to my God for help.
value.verse: I called upon the LORD in my distress *
He heard my voice from his heavenly dwelling; *
value.halfverse: my cry of anguish came to his ears.

value.verse: The earth reeled and rocked; *
value.halfverse:
the roots of the mountains shook;
 they reeled because of his anger.

value.verse:
Smoke rose from his nostrils
and a consuming fire out of his mouth; *
value.halfverse: hot burning coals blazed forth from him.
with a storm cloud under his feet.
value.verse: He parted the heavens and came down *
He mounted on cherubim and flew; *
value.halfverse: he swooped on the wings of the wind.
he made dark waters and thick clouds his pavilion.
value.verse: He wrapped darkness about him; *
From the brightness of his presence, through the clouds, *
value.halfverse: burst hailstones and coals of fire.
the Most High uttered his voice.
value.verse: The LORD thundered out of heaven; *

value.halfverse: he hurled thunderbolts and routed them.
value.verse: He loosed his arrows and scattered them; *

value.halfverse:
at your battle cry, O LORD,
 at the blast of the breath of your nostrils.
value.verse:
The beds of the seas were uncovered,
and the foundations of the world laid bare, *
He reached down from on high and grasped me; *
value.halfverse: he drew me out of great waters.
for they were too mighty for me.
value.verse:
He delivered me from my strong enemies
and from those who hated me; *

value.halfverse: but the LORD was my support.
value.verse: They confronted me in the day of my disaster; *

value.halfverse: he rescued me because he delighted in me.
value.verse: He brought me out into an open place; *

value.halfverse: because my hands were clean he rewarded me;
value.verse: The LORD rewarded me because of my righteous dealing; *

value.halfverse: and have not offended against my God;
value.verse: For I have kept the ways of the LORD *

value.halfverse: and his decrees I have not put away from me;
value.verse: For all his judgments are before my eyes, *

value.halfverse: and have kept myself from iniquity;
value.verse: For I have been blameless with him *

value.halfverse: because of the cleanness of my hands in his sight.
value.verse: Therefore the LORD rewarded me according to my righteous dealing, *

value.halfverse: with the forthright you show yourself forthright.
value.verse: With the faithful you show yourself faithful, O God; *
With the pure you show yourself pure, *
value.halfverse: but with the crooked you are wily.
but you will humble the haughty eyes.
value.verse: You will save a lowly people, *

value.halfverse: my God, you make my darkness bright.
value.verse: You, O LORD, are my lamp; *
With you I will break down an enclosure; *
value.halfverse: with the help of my God I will scale any wall.
he is a shield to all who trust in him.
value.verse:
As for God, his ways are perfect;
the words of the LORD are tried in the fire; *
For who is God, but the LORD? *
value.halfverse: who is the Rock, except our God?

value.verse: It is God who girds me about with strength *
value.halfverse: and makes my way secure.
and lets me stand firm on the heights.
value.verse: He makes me sure-footed like a deer *

value.halfverse: and my arms for bending even a bow of bronze.
value.verse: He trains my hands for battle *

value.halfverse:
your right hand also sustains me;
 your loving care makes me great.
value.verse: You have given me your shield of victory; *

value.halfverse: and my ankles do not give way.
value.verse: You lengthen my stride beneath me, *

value.halfverse: I will not turn back till I have destroyed them.
value.verse: I pursue my enemies and overtake them; *
I strike them down, and they cannot rise; *
value.halfverse: they fall defeated at my feet.

you have cast down my adversaries beneath me;
 you have put my enemies to flight.
value.verse: You have girded me with strength for the battle; *

I destroy those who hate me;
they cry out, but there is none to help them; *
value.halfverse: they cry to the LORD, but he does not answer.

value.verse: I beat them small like dust before the wind; *
value.halfverse: I trample them like mud in the streets.

value.verse: You deliver me from the strife of the peoples; *
value.halfverse: you put me at the head of the nations.
strangers will cringe before me.
value.verse:
A people I have not known shall serve me;
no sooner shall they hear than they shall obey me; *
The foreign peoples will lose heart; *
value.halfverse: they shall come trembling out of their strongholds.
Exalted is the God of my salvation!
value.verse: The LORD lives!  Blessed is my Rock! *

value.halfverse: and cast down the peoples beneath me.
value.verse: He is the God who gave me victory *

You rescued me from the fury of my enemies;
you exalted me above those who rose against me; *
value.halfverse: you saved me from my deadly foe.

value.verse: Therefore will I extol you among the nations, O LORD, *
value.halfverse: and sing praises to your Name.

he shows loving-kindness to his anointed,
 to David and his descendants for ever.
value.verse: He multiplies the victories of his king; *
